title: Orders from New York
description: Write a query to list all orders placed by customers from New York. Display order_id, order_date, and name (customer name).
hint: Join orders with customers, then filter with WHERE on the city column.
solution: SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, customers.name FROM orders INNER JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customers.city = 'New York'
